cyclone.name: NICOLE
cyclone.current_location: about 25 mi ENE of Great Abaco Island, or 210 mi E of West Palm Beach, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: moving west toward the northwestern Bahamas today, then forecast to turn WNW-NW and make landfall along Florida’s east coast before recurving N-NE across the southeastern United States
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: east‐central Florida coast (roughly Boca Raton to the Flagler/Volusia County line)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch from Hallandale Beach to Boca Raton FL and for Lake Okeechobee; Tropical Storm Watch south of Hallandale Beach to north of Ocean Reef FL
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning the Abacos, Berry Islands & Grand Bahama Island and from Boca Raton to the Flagler/Volusia County Line FL; extensive Tropical Storm Warnings from Bimini northward along much of the Florida, Georgia and South Carolina coasts
weather_observation.impacted_coast: northwestern Bahamas, Florida east coast, portions of Florida west coast, Georgia and the Carolinas coastline
